data.title: Muslims doctors in nine medical colleges in Bengal stands at 6.6%; RTI enquiries reveal
data.description: Murshidabad Medical College and Hospital recorded highest number of Muslim doctors at 19.56% and Purulia’s Deben Mahato Hospital and Medical College recorded lowest % Muslim doctors at 1.82%. Muslim population in West Bengal stands at 27.01 %
